hotels.title: Fiji Family-Friendly Beachfront Oasis with Six Onsite Restaurants & Bars, Cultural Activities & Three Freshwater Pools
hotels.description: Surrender to the enchanting allure of Fiji with a stay at Plantation Island Resort, a tropical paradise nestled amid the crystal-clear waters of the South Pacific. This family-friendly resort offers a plethora of activities, from snorkelling in the vibrant coral reefs to exploring the lush coconut plantations. Dine on fresh seafood at the beachfront restaurant, or enjoy a refreshing dip in one of the three sparkling swimming pools.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Fiji All-Suite Retreat on Malolo Lailai with Freshwater Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Stays don’t come more romantic than the newly refurbished Lomani Island Resort, a luxury adults-only retreat nestled on Malolo Lailai Island in the glistening waters of the Mamanuca archipelago. Barefoot luxury and island seclusion abound at this tropical sanctuary, where colourful reefs brimming with striking marine life and powdery white sands beckon. With a name that literally translates to ‘love’ (lomani), this is an escape guaranteed to rekindle the spark or celebrate your connection. There’s romance and adventure to be had among otherworldly coral reefs, in glass-bottom kayaks, surfing, dining under the stars and in the freshwater swimming pool. Located on Malolo Lailai, the Mamanuca’s second-largest island, Lomani Island Resort offers quiet elegance and relaxation. Each day, be the first to leave meandering tracks in the powder-white sand.
